item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The secret inside One Million Checkboxes (762 points | 53 comments)
2. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (1327 points | 303 comments)
3. Elasticsearch is open source, again (391 points | 214 comments)
4. I'm blocking connections from AWS to my on-prem services (76 points | 29 comments)
5. Predicting the future of distributed systems (13 points | 1 comment)
6. Google Closure Library has been archived (94 points | 40 comments)
7. Chrome is entrenching third-party cookies that will mislead users (320 points | 153 comments)
8. Visit Bletchley Park (52 points | 16 comments)
9. Show HN: Amine – Prevents you from switching 100s of Browser Tabs (39 points | 4 comments)
10. SDL3 new GPU API merged (91 points | 31 comments)
11. Firewall rules: not as secure as you think (73 points | 32 comments)
12. Launch HN: CodeViz (YC S24) – Visual maps of your codebase in VS Code (130 points | 49 comments)
13. Anthropic's Prompt Engineering Interactive Tutorial (168 points | 24 comments)
14. Can solar costs keep shrinking? (256 points | 398 comments)
15. DuckDuckGo for Mac is now open source (80 points | 26 comments)
16. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (197 points | 29 comments)
17. Mastering ISO 8583 Message Networking with Golang (22 points | 4 comments)
18. Show HN: A discovery-focused search engine for Hacker News (132 points | 24 comments)
19. Californians can now add their mobile driver's license to Google Wallet (48 points | 37 comments)
20. Merchants of Complexity (10 points | discuss)
21. Poly (YC S22) is hiring Rust experts in SF to build "Arc browser for files" ( | hide)
22. Judges rule Big Tech's free ride on Section 230 is over (355 points | 406 comments)
23. Early Scenes: Remembering a Childhood in the South Bronx (8 points | 2 comments)
24. Show HN: An open-source, local-first Webflow for your own app (176 points | 44 comments)
25. How I learned to stop worrying and love userspace networking (149 points | 40 comments)
26. Launch HN: Patchwork (YC S24) – Automatically add structured logs to your code (80 points | 26 comments)
27. Judge rules $400M algorithmic system illegally denied Medicaid benefits (329 points | 92 comments)
28. Show HN: MinutesLink – AI note taker for online calls (14 points | 5 comments)
29. Floating points between zero and one (85 points | 56 comments)
30. Air Con: $1697 for an on/off switch (1767 points | 455 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
